description.value: When making a Melee Attack against a Foe with a Size Trait greater than the Character's, the character imposes a -10xSize Difference Penalty to any Parry or Dodge Test to avoid their Melee Attacks.

system.benefit: When making a Melee Attack against a Foe with a Size Trait greater than the Character's, the character imposes a -10xSize Difference Penalty to any Parry or Dodge Test to avoid their Melee Attacks.
